c74object.name: ears.hoa.decode~
c74object.description: Decodes higher-order ambisonic buffers for a set of loudspeakers or for binaural listening

method.name: list/llll
method.description:
A list or llll in the first inlet is supposed to contain buffer names and will trigger the buffer processing and output the processed buffer names (depending on the naming attribute).
A number or an llll in the second inlet is expected to contain a hoadecode parameter (depending on the ampunit) or an envelope (also see envampunit).

method.name: number
method.description: A number in the second inlet sets the hoadecode parameter (depending on the ampunit).

attribute.name: azimuth
attribute.description: Sets the azimuth of each loudspeaker (in the unit defined by the angleunit attribute)

attribute.name: binaural
attribute.description: Toggles the ability to decode into a binaural buffer

attribute.name: blocksamps
attribute.description: Sets the block size (in samples) for decoding

attribute.name: dimension
attribute.description: Sets the dimension (order will then be inferred from the number of input channels).

attribute.name: elevation
attribute.description: Sets the elevation of each loudspeaker (in the unit defined by the angleunit attribute)

c74object.discussion: The object uses the HOALibrary (https://github.com/CICM/HoaLibrary-Light) in turns using the Eigen library (http://eigen.tuxfamily.org) The normalization convention is SN2D or SN3D (depending on the dimension), the channel order is ACN.
